code: public void testRelease() throws Exception {     MockBigArrays mockBigArrays = new MockBigArrays(new MockPageCacheRecycler(Settings.EMPTY), new NoneCircuitBreakerService()).     try (ReleasableBytesStreamOutput output = getRandomReleasableBytesStreamOutput(mockBigArrays)) {         output.writeBoolean(randomBoolean()).     }     MockBigArrays.ensureAllArraysAreReleased(). }

private ReleasableBytesStreamOutput getRandomReleasableBytesStreamOutput(MockBigArrays mockBigArrays) throws IOException {     ReleasableBytesStreamOutput output = new ReleasableBytesStreamOutput(mockBigArrays).     if (randomBoolean()) {         for (int i = 0. i < scaledRandomIntBetween(1, 32). i++) {             output.write(randomByte()).         }     }     return output. }
